meta.notes: Monetary values in nominal rupiah; where the ABM needs a down‑scaled micro scenario, use the multiplier in the YAML config instead of altering these base figures.

indonesia.scale_note: Lower bound of KBMI‑1 core‑capital threshold; adjust via config‑scaling for micro runs.
indonesia.source: POJK 12/03/2021 §6 – KBMI‑1 ≤ Rp 6 trn; OJK Banking Statistics Dec 2024.

united_states.scale_note: Representatif bank komunitas (assets < US$1.6 bn, CRA 2025).
united_states.source: FDIC CRA asset-size threshold for small banks US$1.609 bn; assume 9–10 % leverage → ≈US$150 m Tier-1 capital.

eurozone.scale_note: Bank menengah UE; aset ± €1 mld dengan CET1 ≈ 12 %.
eurozone.source: EBA (Mar 2025) CET1 ≈ 16  %; size proxy €1 bn × 12 % → €120 m.

crypto_exposure_ratio.description: Estimated share of total assets linked to stable‑coins.
crypto_exposure_ratio.source: FSB (2023) ‘High‑level Recommendations …’, Annex B – supervisory survey ranges.

indonesia.source: BI Press‑release No. 27/153/DKom (18 Jul 2025) – avg. bank lending rate 9.16 %.

united_states.source: Federal Reserve ‘Bank Prime Loan Rate’ (MPRIME) – Jun 2025 7.50 %.

loan_demand_range.source: World Bank (2024) Micro‑loan Survey Indonesia, Fig. 2.

risk_tolerance_distribution.source: Behavioural assumption calibrated to DeFi user variance (Gudgeon et al., 2020).

default_probability.source: BI Financial Stability Briefing – NPL retail 2.52 % (May 2023).

initial_capital.source: Stress‑test assumption; institutional bots typically ≥ US$100 k.

reaction_threshold.source: Kaiko ‘Defining Depegs’ (2024) & ECB stable‑coin liquidity slides.

profit_fraction_per_trade.description: Share of capital deployed per trade (extreme‑case).

initial_reserve.source: Model assumption – sized to absorb ~10 % de‑peg.

intervention_magnitude.description: Share of reserve injected when peg breaks.

liquidity_buffer.source: IMF macro‑financial stress‑test templates (20 % systemic exposure).

intervention_magnitude.description: Portion of buffer used per bailout round.
